translation.en: [man] Beer.
A wise man once said that beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
translation.it: Un saggio ha detto che ti fa sentire come dovresti sentirti senza birra.

translation.en: Couldn't agree more.
First one's on the house.
Uh, actually, I'm looking for the Accommodator.
Sorry. We don't have the Accommodator.
Yeah, it's not a beer. It's a dildo.
translation.it: Sì, non è una birra, è un dildo.

translation.en: [stammering] What? Why does everyone think this is a porn shop?
translation.it: Ma perché tutti pensano che questo sia un sexy shop?

translation.en: Well, we're in Van Nuys, and you spelled "extreme" with triple X's, so...
translation.it: Beh, siamo a Van Nuys e lì c'è una scritta con tre X, quindi...

translation.en: Okay, because my last name is Rodman, and the beer,
translation.it: Ok, perché il mio cognome è Rodman e la birra, come sentirà, è molto estrema.

translation.en: as you will taste, is very extreme.
translation.it: e la birra, come sentirà, è molto estrema.

translation.en: -This is my most drinkable ale. -Mmm!
translation.it: È la mia birra più bevibile.

translation.en: It's called the Rod Guzzler.
Yeah.
-This is bright beer. Nothing fresher. -Bright beer.
translation.it: - È filtrata. Niente di più fresco. - Filtrata?

translation.en: -Okay. -[Rodman] Yeah.
[customer] Mmm! Incredible.
If you just sold dildos and fetish wear like you advertise, this place would be a home run, Wilheim.
translation.it: Se vendessi dildo e abiti fetish, questo posto sarebbe un successo, Wilheim.

translation.en: My name's Wilhelm. My real name's Will, but I had it legally changed to Wilhelm,
translation.it: Mi chiamo Wilhelm. Il vero nome è Will, ma l'ho cambiato in Wilhelm,

translation.en: in honor of the Bavarian duke responsible for the Reinheitsgebot,
translation.it: in onore del duca bavarese autore del Reinheitsgebot,

translation.en: which is the beer purity law of 1516.
translation.it: la legge sulla purezza della birra del 1516.

translation.en: Ooh, Chuy, Chuy, Ch-Chuy! Come here!
Come here. You gotta meet this guy.
Chuy used to work at the auto body shop next door,
and I poached him because he wanted a little career change.
I wanna be a businessman, so I watch him.
translation.it: Voglio fare l'imprenditore e guardo lui.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Chuy.
If I just do the opposite of whatever he does, sky's the limit for me.
translation.it: Faccio l'opposto di quello che fa. Nessuno mi può fermare!

translation.en: -[Wilhelm laughs] Yeah. -Okay.
Hey, boss, tonight I'm throwing a tasting party for my soccer buds.
translation.it: Capo, stasera faccio una degustazione per la mia squadra di calcio.

translation.en: Mind if I take home a little research?
Take whatever you want. You know that's the rule.
translation.it: Prendi quello che vuoi, sai che è la regola.

translation.en: Thank you. Later, man.
What a great guy, right?
-Incredible. -He's a gem.
-[customer] You're lucky to have him. -Nope, drop it.
Oh, man.
Your car's being towed.
Oh, shit.
-Mm-kay. Bye. -[customer] Oh, shit.
-So sorry. See you again. -Bye, Ben. Nice meeting you.
translation.it: - Mi spiace. Ci vediamo! - È stato un piacere.

translation.en: -Bye! Okay. -Hope you get your dildo.
translation.it: - In bocca al lupo per il dildo! - Ok.

translation.en: Stop letting Chuy take the booze.
translation.it: Non dare più alcol a Chuy.

translation.en: Will, what are you doing?
-LeBron James or Abe Lincoln? -[laughs]
-Colonel Sanders. -[coughs]
Oh, my God, Will, get your shit together.
[laughing] Everything is gonna be fine, okay?
The distributor's coming by today. He likes our beer.
translation.it: Oggi viene il distributore. La birra gli piace. Wir sind prima!

translation.en: -We're golden. Stop being a buzzkill. -Oh, my God. I--
translation.it: Siamo a posto! Non fare la guastafeste.

translation.en: I see how much you drink, okay? Nothing can kill your buzz.
translation.it: Vedo quanto bevi. Niente te la guasta!

translation.en: Even your dog is day drunk.
translation.it: Anche il tuo cane è ubriaco.

translation.en: So what? He's a little drunk.
-Friar Lucas knows when to say when. -Does he?
translation.it: Frate Lucas sa quando fermarsi. Davvero?

translation.en: Come here. I got a question for you.
translation.it: Vieni, ho una domanda per te.

translation.en: -Why did you put the darts on this side? -[Wilhelm] Ah, let me tell you why.
translation.it: Perché hai messo le freccette qui? Ora te lo spiego.

translation.en: I needed room for my latest genius promotion.
translation.it: Mi serviva spazio per la mia ultima geniale promozione.

translation.en: Ta-da, huh? Pretty good.
You take a growler home with you, and then you get another one for free when you come back.
translation.it: Ti porti una birra sciolta a casa e ne ricevi una gratis quando torni.

translation.en: -It's gonna catch on like wildfire. -[older man grunting]
I think it already has.
No, hey, that is the wrong kind of growler. You can't do that here!
translation.it: No, non quel tipo di sciolta! Non puoi farla qui!

translation.en: Hey, the sign says I can. "Take a growler, leave a growler." Same thing.
translation.it: Leggi: "Prendila sciolta, avrai altra sciolta". Uguale.

translation.en: No, not my kind of growlers.
-Please, get out of here. -[squelches]
Oh, no, no, no!
Yes. You see, to my point,
I'm taking a growler here, and this morning, I left a growler there.
translation.it: Sono tornato per altra sciolta, che stamattina ho fatto lì.

translation.en: You see? Same thing.
-You need shoes. -It's sanitary.
translation.it: È igienico. Ti servono delle scarpe, a me non servono più.

translation.en: -I... don't need these anymore. -[groans]
translation.it: Ti servono delle scarpe, a me non servono più.

translation.en: You have to promise me you will stop taking a growler!
But can I leave a growler?
I'm gonna give you my shoes, and you're gonna go, okay?
translation.it: Io ti lascio le scarpe e tu te ne vai, ok?

translation.en: [older man] But that I could, my dear man.
Since the death of printed media, I'm at a loss for wipes, hmm?
translation.it: Con la morte dei giornali stampati, non so più come pulirmi.

translation.en: Ever tried to wipe your ass with a Kindle?
translation.it: Hai provato a pulirti con un Kindle?

translation.en: -[groans] -No!
translation.it: Hai provato a pulirti con un Kindle? - No! - Torna in ufficio, senatore!

translation.en: -Back to the statehouse, Senator. -Senator? What?
translation.it: - No! - Torna in ufficio, senatore! Senatore? Cosa?

translation.en: The rock shoe of the white, urban climber.
translation.it: Merrell, la scarpa dell'arrampicatore di città.

translation.en: [man] Hmm. The hops are timid,
and there's a meek earthiness vying for attention.
translation.it: e c'è una lieve terrosità in cerca d'attenzione.

translation.en: [smacks lips] Detecting a delicate bouquet of pine with notes of citrus.
translation.it: Sento un delicato bouquet di pino, con note di agrumi.

translation.en: Possibly clementines?
-[Chuy] He's good. -[smacks lips]
If the brewmaster remembered that he was making a beer
translation.it: Se il birraio si fosse ricordato di fare una birra e non un frullato,

translation.en: and not a smoothie, you might really have something here.
translation.it: Se il birraio si fosse ricordato di fare una birra e non un frullato, non sarebbe male.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the beer, much like the brewmaster himself,
translation.it: Sfortunatamente, la birra, proprio come il birraio stesso,

translation.en: smells like, as he would say, "Scheiße!" [chuckles]
translation.it: puzza, come direbbe lui, di Scheiße!

translation.en: -You can pour that out. -Hello, Adam.
-Nice to see you, too. -[Adam] Hi.
Wait. Who's this guy?
-My brother. -Bring it in.
-[thuds] -[laughs] Oh, shit!
[chuckles softly] Family.
-Will, I didn't know you had a brother. -Yeah, I haven't seen Oxy in a long time.
translation.it: - Non sapevo avessi un fratello. - Non vedo Ossi da tanto.

translation.en: Aww, that's a cute nickname.
Unless it's short for Oxycontin. [chuckles]
No, it's short for oxidation.
Oxidation destroys beer... and Adam destroys everything.
translation.it: L'ossidazione distrugge la birra e Adam distrugge tutto.

translation.en: I can get you Oxy.
We should be so close.
[Wilhelm] Adam and I were adopted by farmers in beautiful Yakima Valley.
translation.it: Siamo stati adottati da contadini della Yakima Valley,

translation.en: And as you know, that's where 70% of American hops are grown.
translation.it: dove si coltiva il 70% del luppolo americano.

translation.en: [woman] Nobody knows that, and nobody cares.
translation.it: Nessuno lo sa e a nessuno interessa.

translation.en: I'm actually angry that I know now.
[Wilhelm] Pipe down! I'm painting a picture.
Adam snuck me my first beer, and I thought it was horrible.
translation.it: Adam mi ha procurato la prima birra e io l'ho trovata disgustosa.

translation.en: And that's when he said, "We can make it better."
translation.it: Allora, mi ha detto: "Noi possiamo farla meglio".

translation.en: The next few years, we became the best beer-making duo around.
translation.it: Negli anni successivi, siamo diventati la miglior coppia di birrai.

translation.en: We even entered a beer contest.
[woman] You guys entered a beer contest when you were that young?
translation.it: Una gara di birra da così piccoli?

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Wilhelm] And we won.
-[woman] That's great. -[Wilhelm] Not great.
Adam really wanted to use his beer,
translation.it: Adam voleva usare la sua birra,

translation.en: but I knew mine was better, so...
translation.it: ma la mia era meglio, quindi...

translation.en: at the last minute, I switched them.
When he found out...
...he was pissed.
I will never work with you again.
translation.it: Non lavorerò mai più con te!

translation.en: Traitor! [grunts]
And I never saw him again... till today.
translation.it: E non l'ho più rivisto fino a oggi.

translation.en: Look, the guy makes really, really good beer.
translation.it: Senti, è davvero bravo a fare la birra. È solo che...

translation.en: -It's just that-- -Will, like, come on.
You spent your money on a place that's way too big,
translation.it: Hai speso i tuoi soldi per un posto troppo grande

translation.en: and there's barely any customers.
Um, by the way, boss, "taking a growler" means "to shit."
Where were you a week ago?
Whatever you think about your brother, if he makes amazing beer,
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa pensi di lui, se la birra è ottima, perché non dargli una chance?

translation.en: why not give him a shot?
translation.it: se la birra è ottima, perché non dargli una chance?

translation.en: So...
I have discussed it with my team, and we have decided
translation.it: ne ho parlato con la mia squadra e potrai lavorare con noi alle seguenti condizioni.

translation.en: to let you work with us on the following conditions--
translation.it: e potrai lavorare con noi alle seguenti condizioni.

translation.en: I accept.
We gotta make a lot of changes around here. You gotta change the way you're marketing this place.
translation.it: Dobbiamo cambiare molte cose, a partire dal marketing.

translation.en: Yes, okay, great. That's exactly what we shall do.
translation.it: Ok, è proprio quello che faremo.

translation.en: [Adam] Okay, let's get rid of that barrel, these menus.
translation.it: Ok, via quel barile, via i menù. Cosa?

translation.en: -What? -Get rid of those games. No chairs, no tables.
translation.it: Via i giochi, niente sedie e tavoli.

translation.en: Send 'em back to the junkyard I assume you got them from.
translation.it: Rimandali alla discarica dove li hai presi.

translation.en: Maybe board up these windows.
-Why? -'Cause they look like shit.
Okay, pool tables and beer pong, here we come.
translation.it: - Biliardo e birra pong in arrivo! - No, il contrario.

translation.en: No, the opposite. We want this whole place to be stripped down.
translation.it: - Biliardo e birra pong in arrivo! - No, il contrario. Riduciamo questo posto all'essenziale.

translation.en: We want people to be able to meditate on the beer.
translation.it: La gente deve poter meditare sulla birra.

translation.en: I want our customers to see the way I prepare the grist for the mash tun.
translation.it: Voglio che i clienti vedano come preparo il malto per la miscela.

translation.en: -Oh, my God, he is worse than you. -Told ya.
translation.it: - È peggio di te! - L'avevo detto.

translation.en: And you guys could really stand to fix yourselves up a little bit.
translation.it: E voi potreste sistemarvi un pochino.

translation.en: Do you work here?
Yes.
Yes, Chuy, you work here.
-Yes! Yes. -Yes, you do. You do.
Okay, great. And you're wearing sandals in a brewery?
translation.it: E porti i sandali in un birrificio?

translation.en: -Pool wear? -Yes.
-Yes. -[Adam] All right.
There's something about you. I like you. Put your hair up, pull it back.
translation.it: Hai qualcosa, mi piaci. Tu potresti legare i capelli, renderli presentabili.

translation.en: Make it more presentable.
translation.it: Tu potresti legare i capelli, renderli presentabili.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure thing.
-[Adam] Sick! Look at her ear. It's bad. -What?
-Y-Your ear is all messed up. -Oh, my God. Calm down. It's just cauliflower ear.
translation.it: - Hai l'orecchio deforme! - Dio, è solo un orecchio a cavolfiore.

translation.en: Yeah, but it is gross. Looks like a dog chewed on it.
translation.it: Sì, ma fa schifo. Sembra masticato da un cane.

translation.en: It stinks, too.
-It stinks? -[woman] It doesn't.
Sarah used to be an MMA fighter.
Yeah, and I had to retire after I got injured.
-Oh, my God. -[Sarah] It's an injury.
translation.it: Mi sono ritirata dopo l'infortunio. Scommetto che la gente è felice di non vedere quella cosa.

translation.en: I bet people are so happy to not see that melted thing.
translation.it: Scommetto che la gente è felice di non vedere quella cosa.

translation.en: What? They love it, okay? They love me and my ear.
translation.it: La adorano, ok? Amano me e il mio orecchio.

translation.en: [Adam] Okay.
-Bye. Bye. -[Sarah] Come on, we got shit to do.
-[Adam groans] -Hello, hello. Welcome to Rodman's.
What can I get you?
Hi. Um, can I have a Stella?
We actually only serve our own beer here, so we don't have Stella,
translation.it: Serviamo solo la nostra birra e non abbiamo la Stella,

translation.en: but I'd be happy to find you something that is similar--
translation.it: ma potrei trovarti qualcosa di simile.

translation.en: Sorry, you want a Stella?
No, Stella is the most unoriginal beer in the world.
translation.it: No, Stella è la birra meno originale al mondo.

translation.en: So that means that you're the most unoriginal person in the world.
translation.it: Perciò tu sei la persona meno originale al mondo.

translation.en: What about you? Hi, how are you?
-What are you thinking of having? -Do you have something like a Bud Light?
translation.it: - Cosa vorresti? - Qualcosa tipo una Bud Light?

translation.en: No, no, no.
Bud Light, Bud Light, Bud Light. [snorts, spits]
You can lap that up. It'll taste like Bud Light.
translation.it: Lecca quello, sa di Bud Light.

translation.en: That's so gross.
I apologize on his behalf. The drinks are on me.
translation.it: Mi scuso a nome suo. Vi offro da bere.

translation.en: -We'll go to a different bar. -Weird.
[Wilhelm] If we could buy your first round--
-No! Please come back again! -[door slams]
What are you doing? You can't turn people away.
translation.it: Che fai? Non puoi mandar via le persone?

translation.en: Come on, they were barely people. They wanted to drink a Stella and a Bud Light.
translation.it: Me le chiami persone? Volevano Stella e Bud Light.

translation.en: Beer is about bringing people together,
translation.it: La birra serve a unire le persone

translation.en: and Rodman's is the perfect hang.
translation.it: e Rodman's è il locale perfetto.

translation.en: What matters most is making the perfect beer.
translation.it: Conta solo fare la birra perfetta. Il resto è irrilevante.

translation.en: -Everything else is immaterial. -[Wilhelm] No.
translation.it: Conta solo fare la birra perfetta. Il resto è irrilevante. No, Ossi! L'importante è servire le persone,

translation.en: What matters most is serving people,
translation.it: No, Ossi! L'importante è servire le persone,

translation.en: regardless of their beer preference, race, religion.
translation.it: senza badare a preferenze di birra, razza o religione.

translation.en: That's the German way.
No, I don't think that's right.
[Wilhelm] I've never needed you.
When you went off to Oregon State at 14 to get your stupid beer degree...
translation.it: Quando sei andato in Oregon per la tua stupida laurea in birra...

translation.en: My master's of agricultural chemistry and zymurgy?
translation.it: I master in chimica agraria e zimologia?

translation.en: ...I was learning how to make beer the hard way: on the streets and outdoor plazas of Europe.
translation.it: Ho imparato a fare birra con le cattive: per le strade e le piazze d'Europa.

translation.en: Do have any idea how many beer gardens I drank my way through
translation.it: Sai in quante birrerie ho dovuto bere per perfezionare la mia arte?

translation.en: -before I perfected my craft? -[Adam] And what craft is that?
translation.it: Sai in quante birrerie ho dovuto bere per perfezionare la mia arte? Che arte sarebbe?

translation.en: Throwing up on yourself and then contracting super gonorrhea from a youth hostel toilet seat?
translation.it: Vomitarti addosso e prendere la gonorrea nel bagno di un ostello?

translation.en: So you do follow me on Instagram!
Okay, so you were able to drag your gonorrhea-riddled member
translation.it: Ok, sei riuscito a trascinare il tuo membro infestato di gonorrea

translation.en: into a monastery where they make beer, and you memorized their recipes.
translation.it: in un monastero dove fanno birra e hai memorizzato le ricette.

translation.en: That does not make you a Braumeister.
translation.it: Questo non fa di te un braumeister.

translation.en: That makes you a Xerox machine.
What's a Xerox machine?
Can you get her out of here, please? Go.
Hi, sir. Welcome to Rodman's. What can I get you?
translation.it: Salve, benvenuto da Rodman's. Cosa le porto?

translation.en: I'll have whatever you recommend.
[Wilhelm] Whatever I recommend. Excellent.
Adam, this is how you run a brewery. Let me pull my Rodman Stiff Stout for you.
translation.it: Così funziona un birrificio. Le spillo la mia Rodman Stiff Stout.

translation.en: Oh, I gotta change that name.
And he wonders why people think we're a sex store.
translation.it: Chissà perché pensano sia un sexy shop?

translation.en: -[Adam] People don't think about you guys. -Here you go, sir.
translation.it: La gente non pensa a voi. Ecco a lei, signore.

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[Wilhelm] Take a sip.
-[man] Tasty. -Thank you.
-[smacks lips] Are you Wilhelm Rodman? -Mm-hmm.
You are three months behind on your rent.
translation.it: Lei è tre mesi indietro con l'affitto.

translation.en: Pay up or you're gonna be evicted.
This is really good.
It's definitely not, and I would've gotten him out of here two or three months ago.
translation.it: Non è vero e avrebbe dovuto cacciarlo due o tre mesi fa.

translation.en: Hey, Will, how do you say "you're fucked" in German?
translation.it: Come si dice "sei fottuto" in tedesco?

translation.en: [in German] You are fucked!
[in English] I picked up a few things.
[Wilhelm] Okay, we are not going out of business.
We need to spend all of our time in putting together the perfect flight to impress the hell outta this distributor.
translation.it: Dobbiamo preparare il piano perfetto per far colpo su quel distributore.

translation.en: What's your favorite beer?
I can run to Angel City and pick up a few kegs.
translation.it: Posso prendere dei fusti da Angel City.

translation.en: [gasps] That's genius.
translation.it: Posso prendere dei fusti da Angel City. È geniale.

translation.en: I mean, I-I love where this guy's head is at.
-You're great. -Thank you.
-I don't like where this is going. -It feels good here.
translation.it: - Non mi piace questa cosa. - A me sì.

translation.en: What the fuck?
-[woman grunts] -[Wilhelm] You came in a little hot again.
translation.it: Ehi, siete arrivati un po' lunghi.

translation.en: [woman] Sorry about that.
It's really hard to park when digitally stimulating each other.
translation.it: È dura parcheggiare mentre ci si stimola con le dita.

translation.en: You can park safely, or you can orgasm at the same time.
translation.it: Bisogna scegliere se parcheggiare o avere un orgasmo.

translation.en: -I choose the orgasm. -[Adam] Cool.
Hey, this is my brother Adam.
[chuckles] You guys look nothing alike. -Thank you. -Danke.
translation.it: - Non vi somigliate per niente. - Grazie.

translation.en: -You look like lovers. -[Wilhelm] What?
[woman] Yeah, lovers.
-[man] Do you ever...? -No!
-That'd be fun. -Cute. [Wilhelm] Barely talk.
Kids Menu! Open for business!
-Chicken fingers! Corn dogs! -Mac and cheese!
Juice boxes! Everything organic...
translation.it: Succo di frutta! Tutto biologico e a chilometro zero.

translation.en: -[both] ...and locally sourced. -[Adam] Wow.
translation.it: Tutto biologico e a chilometro zero. Wow! Gli adulti mangiano questa roba?

translation.en: And adults actually consume this stuff?
translation.it: Wow! Gli adulti mangiano questa roba?

translation.en: Hell yeah, dude. Everyone loves ordering off the kids' menu.
translation.it: Certo! A tutti piace ordinare dal menù per bambini.

translation.en: -Who doesn't love a kids' menu? -Right? But restaurants make it off-limits for grown-ups.
translation.it: A chi non piace? Ma i ristoranti escludono gli adulti.

translation.en: -[man] For us... -[both] ...nothing is off-limits.
translation.it: Per noi... niente è off limits.

translation.en: -That's what I was gonna say. -I was gonna say that.
-You're not-- oh, my-- -[both moaning]
[Wilhelm] Nothing's off-limits.
How do you do it? You live together, you work together.
translation.it: Come fate? Vivete insieme, lavorate insieme.

translation.en: I'm presuming that you don't share deodorant together.
Correct. Deodorant is a tool of the government
translation.it: È uno strumento del governo per rintracciarti.

translation.en: -to track you. -[woman] To control you.
They put, uh, salt in it--
Aluminum, baby.
Thank you, babe. They put aluminum in it, and that's how they know where you are.
translation.it: - L'alluminio, baby. - Grazie. Mettono l'alluminio ed è così che sanno dove sei.

translation.en: God, it is so concerning that you run a food truck and you confused aluminum and salt.
translation.it: È preoccupante che tu venda cibo e confonda alluminio e sale.

translation.en: Oh, no, they're both fine to eat. -You can just not put one under your arm. -[woman] Yeah.
translation.it: Sono buoni da mangiare. Non puoi metterli sotto il braccio.

translation.en: Do you guys ever get sick of each other?
We've been together ten months and haven't spent a moment apart.
translation.it: In dieci mesi non ci siamo mai separati.

translation.en: -Not one moment. -What about when you go to the bathroom?
translation.it: Neanche un minuto. Quando andate in bagno?

translation.en: [both] What about it?
-Can I order something? -Yes. We need hairnets.
translation.it: - Posso ordinare? - Sì. Ci servono le retine.

translation.en: Yes, sanitation is so important. [Adam] Totally.
Okay.
Cool, cool, cool. I'm gonna go.
-Uh, you should join me as well. -[woman] Hold on.
You didn't dig in deep back there.
Here, want me to give you a lift? Step on my hand.
translation.it: Vuoi che ti sollevi? - Sì. - Sali sulla mano.

translation.en: -[Wilhelm] Adam! -Yeah.
I think he's about to put a hairnet over his hat.
translation.it: Sta per mettere una retina sul cappello.

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, there you go. Okay, right up there.
-[man] Hello. -[Wilhelm] Hi.
-East Valley Craft Distribution. -[Wilhelm] Yes.
-Wilhelm Rodman, brewmaster. -[Adam] Hello. Adam Rodman. Hi. Head brewmaster.
translation.it: - Wilhelm Rodman, mastro birraio. - Adam Rodman, birraio capo.

translation.en: -Hi there. Hi. -Okay. Hi.
-[laughing] -[Adam] Don't make it weird.
-Let him go. -All right.
-So sorry. -[Cole] Okay.
-Cool. -[Adam] Mm-hmm.
So, uh, which one of you is in charge?
translation.it: Allora, chi di voi è il capo?

translation.en: [both] I am.
Family business, like the Lehman Brothers.
translation.it: Azienda di famiglia, come Lehman Brothers.

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah. Uh, big fans.
You don't know who they are. They stole a lot of money. [laughs]
translation.it: Non sai chi sono. Hanno rubato molti soldi.

translation.en: Take a seat, and I will bring a flight that is going to...
translation.it: Siediti e ti porterò un assaggio che ti...

translation.en: bedazzle you.
Okay. Great.
"Bedazzle" him?
-Oof! That was bad, even for you. -I am nervous!
translation.it: - Pessimo persino per te. - Sono emozionato!

translation.en: So, what restaurants are gonna be serving my beer selection?
translation.it: Quali ristoranti serviranno la mia selezione di birre?

translation.en: Off the top of my head, I think the Tipsy Cow
translation.it: Così, su due piedi, penso che il Tipsy Cow e il Local Peasant

translation.en: and the Local Peasant have a tap open for local brews.
translation.it: Così, su due piedi, penso che il Tipsy Cow e il Local Peasant abbiano una spina per birre locali.

translation.en: Fantastic. And these establishments, what kind of savory apps are they serving?
translation.it: Fantastico! E questi esercizi, che genere di squisitezze servono?

translation.en: Uh, I mean, I-I really enjoy the short-rib poutine.
translation.it: A me piace molto la poutine con costolette.

translation.en: -Are you writing that down? -[Adam] I'm not.
-I see you writing things down. -It looks like that, but I'm not.
translation.it: Vedo che scrivi qualcosa. - Sembra così, ma... - Hai scritto cosa mi piace.

translation.en: You just wrote down what I like to eat.
translation.it: - Sembra così, ma... - Hai scritto cosa mi piace.

translation.en: I honestly did not. You can trust me.
-Okay. -But I-I'm curious,
how often do these establishments clean out their taps?
translation.it: Con quale frequenza svuotano le spine?

translation.en: Uh, I don't-- When they're supposed to?
-Okay, that's all I need. -[Cole] Are you writing that down?
translation.it: - Ok, non mi serve altro. - Lo stai scrivendo?

translation.en: -This isn't gonna work out. -Excuse me?
Wait, are you interviewing me? I'm interviewing you.
translation.it: Mi stai interrogando? Il colloquio lo faccio io!

translation.en: -[Wilhelm] No! -[Adam] Now that the interview's over, I am willing to admit to you I've been writing things down.
translation.it: Ora che il colloquio è finito, lo ammetto, ho scritto delle cose.

translation.en: I knew it. You wrote it all down.
Adam! Adam! I'm so sorry about him.
translation.it: Adam! Mi scuso molto per lui.

translation.en: Why don't you take a quick sample of our four most popular beers?
translation.it: Assaggia le nostre quattro birre più apprezzate.

translation.en: -[Cole] Okay. -[Adam] Let me stop you.
I believe that we have a right to know
if the food these establishments are serving tastes like, as you would say, große Scheiße,
translation.it: se il cibo che questi locali servono sa, come diresti tu, di grosse Scheiße.

translation.en: which is German for--
-Yeah, I know what it means. -It's like "big shit."
-[Cole] Yeah. -I don't know if you knew that.
translation.it: - Sì. - Non so se lo sapevi.

translation.en: -I knew it. -[Adam] Okay.
You know what I think? I think we're done here.
translation.it: Sai cosa penso? Penso che abbiamo finito.

translation.en: Done? You're gonna order without sampling? Incredible. How many kegs can we sign you up for?
translation.it: Finito? Ordini senza assaggiare? Quanti fusti prendi?

translation.en: I think I'll order... nein. Which is German for "none."
translation.it: Penso che ne ordinerò nein. Che in tedesco significa "nessuno".

translation.en: -[Adam] Oh, no, it's not. -See what I did?
No, nein would actually just be "no."
[Wilhelm] Cole, please, please--
-[Adam] Bye! -What are you doing?
I just hope the next guy's more collaborative. That's what I'll say.
translation.it: Spero che il prossimo tipo sia più collaborativo.

translation.en: What next guy? There's one guy in Van Nuys! One guy!
translation.it: Quale prossimo? Ce n'è un solo tipo a Van Nuys! Uno!

translation.en: There's one distributor, and it's that guy? [grunts]
translation.it: C'è un solo distributore ed è quello?

translation.en: Van Nuys, it's a bad place-- [groans]
translation.it: Van Nuys è un brutto posto.

translation.en: -Is this what happened to your ear? -Shut up, you baby!
You know what?
-I never should've tracked you down. -I never should've accepted your offer.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto rintracciarti. Non avrei dovuto accettare. Questo posto è peggio del tuo orecchio!

translation.en: This place is even more of a disaster than your melted ear.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto accettare. Questo posto è peggio del tuo orecchio!

translation.en: -I feel bad for Chuy. -Wanna go for round two?
translation.it: Mi spiace per Chuy. - Secondo round? - No!

translation.en: -[Adam] I don't! -See where he parked?
translation.it: - Secondo round? - No! - Dove ha parcheggiato? - Lo troverò.

translation.en: -I'll find him. -[Wilhelm] Thanks.
You are doing the same thing you always do.
translation.it: Stai facendo quello che fai sempre.

translation.en: -You ruin everything. -Oh, hard disagree.
No, don't sit. You're out. Get out. -I'm out? -Uh-huh.
translation.it: - Non sederti. Sei fuori. Vai! - Sono fuori?

translation.en: -[Adam] Okay. -This is done.
-[Adam] Okay, great. -Yeah.
-Bye. -See ya. This was a wonderful reunion.
Bye.
-Fuck. -What?
I have nowhere else to go.
translation.it: - Non so dove altro andare. - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: What do you mean? You said you were killing it in Portland.
translation.it: - Non so dove altro andare. - Che vuoi dire? - A Portland andavi alla grande. - Andavo.

translation.en: [Adam] I was.
translation.it: - A Portland andavi alla grande. - Andavo.

translation.en: I had a falling out with the local brewers.
-There's, like, 100 breweries out there. -There's 84.
And a lot of them are very bad.
Some of them, their best brews taste like the cadaver of a local garbageman. I say that as a fan.
translation.it: Le birre migliori sanno di cadavere di netturbino. E lo dico da fan!

translation.en: Did you tell them that?
Yes, I told them that, okay? It was at a beer expo.
translation.it: Sì, ok? È stato a una fiera della birra.

translation.en: Someone gave me a microphone, I started riffing, and people couldn't handle it.
translation.it: Mi hanno dato un microfono e alla gente non è piaciuto.

translation.en: I also had a problem with the fact that they were letting IPAs into the competitions.
translation.it: Ho avuto anche da ridire sull'ammissione delle IPA in gara.

translation.en: IPAs are what people drink when they're all out of good ideas
translation.it: Le IPA sono quello che la gente beve quando ha finito le buone idee

translation.en: or never had a good idea to begin with.
translation.it: o non ne ha mai avuta una.

translation.en: -[booing] -Oh-- Okay, okay, yeah!
So I submitted an IPA that had a hallucinogen in it.
translation.it: Così, ho presentato una IPA con un allucinogeno.

translation.en: You tried to drug everyone?
That's the difference between you and me.
translation.it: Ecco la differenza tra noi due: tu ci provi...

translation.en: You try, I succeed.
translation.it: Ecco la differenza tra noi due: tu ci provi... Io ci riesco.

translation.en: -[dance music playing] -[distorted] How's that for an IPA?
translation.it: Che ne dite di questa IPA?

translation.en: You can't tell, but I'm giving you all the finger.
translation.it: Non potete vederlo, ma vi sto mostrando il dito.

translation.en: So for that reason, I'm no longer allowed to brew in Portland,
translation.it: Per questo, non posso più fare birra a Portland.

translation.en: or be in Portland...
or be in Oregon. I gotta stay here.
You're a bad person if you make me leave... frankly.
translation.it: Sei una brutta persona se mi mandi via, davvero.

translation.en: Simcoe, from back home.
Hmm, pretty sure it's Columbus.
I can't believe I'm about to say this,
translation.it: È incredibile che stia per dirlo,

translation.en: but I guess we can try working together again.
translation.it: ma forse possiamo riprovare a lavorare insieme.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
And this room'll do.
-This-- It'll do. So, we're good. -What? No.
The bed feels like the natural spot. -Oh, yeah. -Don't!
translation.it: - Il letto sembra il posto naturale. - Non farlo!

translation.en: -Come on, man, that's my spot. -Sorry about the shoes.
translation.it: - È il mio posto. - Scusa per le scarpe.

translation.en: There's so many other spots you can live.
-I belong here. -It's my bed.
-It feels like it's my bed. -You don't wanna sleep there.
translation.it: Sembra proprio il mio. Non ti conviene dormire lì. Mi masturbo... un sacco.

translation.en: I jerk off... a lot...
translation.it: Non ti conviene dormire lì. Mi masturbo... un sacco.

translation.en: -here. -You want to talk about that right now?
No, I'm just saying, I wouldn't want to, like, lay in your juice,
translation.it: No, dico solo che io non vorrei sdraiarmi sul tuo succo,

translation.en: -so why would you want to lay-- -In my "juice"?
-You want to know what I do? -No.
I edge myself to orgasm
but once a month.
Twelve times a year. You know math?
And basically, you pleasure yourself right to the point of climax, and then you dial it back.
translation.it: In pratica, ti masturbi quasi fino all'orgasmo e poi rallenti.

translation.en: And you do that every single day for 30 days,
translation.it: E lo fai ogni giorno per 30 giorni.

translation.en: and then right on that last day, you just... explode.
And what you produce is like a bottle-conditioned saison:
translation.it: Il prodotto ricorda una saison rifermentata in bottiglia:

translation.en: frothy, rich, distinct.
Right now, I'm kinda sensitive 'cause I'm on day nine.
translation.it: Al momento sono sensibile, perché sono al nono giorno.

translation.en: So... fermentation has just begun.
I am frickin' amazing.
I convinced the distributor to come back in a couple weeks,
translation.it: Ho convinto il distributore a tornare tra due settimane,

translation.en: on two conditions.
One: he's not allowed to talk.
Oh, no.
Two: I promised you'd make a new beer for him.
translation.it: Due: gli farai una nuova birra.

translation.en: -Yes, yes, yes, yes. -[Sarah laughs] Sarah, you-- you're incredible.
I know.
What to brew? What to brew?
What about a lager?
A lager? No, it takes too long to brew. Not that I've made one since I was in diapers.
translation.it: No, ci vuole troppo tempo ed è una cosa infantile.

translation.en: What about a rauch porter? No. Smoked ale, it's too risky.
translation.it: - E una rauch porter? - Affumicata, troppo rischiosa.

translation.en: What if we make something that everyone's into, like a hazy IPA?
translation.it: Una cosa che piaccia a tutti, una IPA torbida?

translation.en: That's exactly why we shouldn't make it.
translation.it: Un buon motivo per non farla.

translation.en: Wait, there's different kinds of beers? Why?
translation.it: Ci sono diversi tipi di birra? Perché?

translation.en: Fine, if it'll make you stop whining, I'll make something hoppier.
translation.it: Se non frigni più, farò qualcosa di luppolato.

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm in LA for one day, and I'm already selling out.
translation.it: Sono qui da un giorno e mi sto già svendendo.

translation.en: No, I'm used to making them. I'm gonna make it.
translation.it: No, sono abituato a farle. La farò io.

translation.en: -You? -Yeah.
You think you can brew a better beer than me, Wilhelm the Lesser?
translation.it: Pensi di fare meglio di me, Wilhelm l'Inferiore?

translation.en: I know I can.
-May the best beer win. -[scoffs] Okay.
translation.it: - Che vinca la birra migliore. - Ok.

translation.en: -Can I-- No. -[Adam] I'm not gonna fight you.
-You got there after me. -Unfair.
translation.it: Sei arrivato dopo di me. Sleale!

translation.en: -[Adam] Let go. -[Wilhelm] No.
-We're not-- -[Adam] Let go of my leg.
[Wilhelm] Why is this vest so slippery?
translation.it: Perché questo gilet è così scivoloso?

translation.en: Be still, my hairless avenger. [sighs]
translation.it: Stai fermo, mio giustiziere senza peli.

translation.en: Just 15 more sleeps, big guy.
-I can hear you. -[Adam] No, I know.
You listening is an important part of the process.
translation.it: È una parte importante del processo.

translation.en: What time are you gonna go paint that house, you cretin?
translation.it: A che ora vai a dipingere la casa, ebete?

translation.en: -What's a cretin? -A "cretin" is an idiot.
Typically, cretins don't know the word "cretin," so...
translation.it: Ma gli ebeti non capiscono la parola "ebete".

translation.en: Why would you call a--
[Adam] Unbelievable.
-So, is the bat part of your recipe? -No. But this one is.
translation.it: - La mazza fa parte della ricetta? - No! Ma questa sì.

translation.en: Hey, I found my keys
and another bat, Will.
Oh, shit, where's my wallet?
[Adam] Don't go back in.
Oh, what is that putrid smell? Right, no, I forgot.
translation.it: Cos'è questo odore di marcio? No, dimenticavo, anche tu stai fermentando.

translation.en: You're brewing as well.
translation.it: No, dimenticavo, anche tu stai fermentando.

translation.en: Oh! Acid attack. Oh, my God.
You should go back to your little monk buddies and go milling again 'cause this is a ruined batch.
translation.it: Dovresti tornare dai tuoi amici monaci a macinare, questo lotto è rovinato!

translation.en: I know what I'm doing, okay?
Oh, that has been disproven time and again.
translation.it: Questo è stato smentito più e più volte!

translation.en: Get off of me, shitty beard!
[Sarah] Nothing like watching two betas fight.
I'm gonna digitally remove their clothes and sell this in Japan.
translation.it: Toglierò i vestiti e lo venderò in Giappone.

translation.en: Hey, you're just nervous my beer is gonna be better than yours.
translation.it: Hai solo paura che la mia birra sia meglio della tua!

translation.en: [Adam] I'm never nervous!
-Stay there, you little fish. -No!
[laughs] Oh, I gotcha!
Do you give up?
-[grunts] Friar Lucas, attack! -[barks]
[Chuy] Oh, no.
translation.it: No! Frate Lucas, ora sono molto sensibile.

translation.en: [Adam] Friar Lucas, I'm sensitive. I'm very sensitive right now, Friar Lucas.
translation.it: No! Frate Lucas, ora sono molto sensibile. Sono sensibile, Frate Lucas!

translation.en: Please don't-- [moans]
Oh, I'm ticklish. No, no, no, no. Ooh. [moans]
[grunting] Oh, boy! Oh, it's happening.
What is your problem? Give me that. -Come on. -Come on.
translation.it: Che problema hai? Dammelo. Ma dai.

translation.en: [groans] And I'm back to day one.
translation.it: E sono tornato al giorno uno.

translation.en: I prematurely ejaculated after 29 days. [sighs]
Is that ironic?
Good luck with the distributor today, man.
Thank you, Elvis.
-[groans] -[sighs] Oh, hey, hold on. Take this.
-I don't want it. -It's for luck.
translation.it: Non lo voglio. Porta fortuna! È un regalo, accettalo.

translation.en: It's my gift to you. Take the gift.
translation.it: Porta fortuna! È un regalo, accettalo.

translation.en: Nothing weird about it. It's just one man giving another man a sandwich.
translation.it: Niente di strano. Un uomo che dà un panino a un altro.

translation.en: Where's that negative energy coming from? Your aura is wild right now.
translation.it: Da dove viene quell'energia negativa? La tua aura è agitata.

translation.en: -[woman] Your fries. -Thank you. -I'm loving these chicken wings-- -[Wilhelm] You try it.
translation.it: - Le patatine. - Grazie. Adoro queste ali di pollo.

translation.en: -Uh, fingers. Fingers. -[chuckles]
It's Becky.
Yeah, it is.
Ooh, look at you, Field of Dreams. You have zero chance with Becky.
translation.it: Guardati, Uomo dei sogni. Non hai possibilità con Becky.

translation.en: She and Elvis are like the same person.
translation.it: - Lei ed Elvis sono una cosa sola. - Will!

translation.en: Oh, Will, I would not expect you to understand chemistry.
translation.it: - Lei ed Elvis sono una cosa sola. - Will! Non sai niente di attrazione fisica.

translation.en: -Here. I'll give you a free lecture. -Oh.
-[both moaning, laughing] -Becky, hey.
Look, I was wondering if I could get a little mustard.
translation.it: Potrei avere un po' di senape?

translation.en: Thank you. This is relish.
translation.it: Grazie. È salsa piccante, ma va bene.

translation.en: That's good, though.
translation.it: È salsa piccante, ma va bene.

translation.en: Chemistry.
She practically stank of sex.
Yeah, because she's currently having it with her boyfriend.
translation.it: Sì, lo sta facendo col suo ragazzo.

translation.en: Hey, guys, the distributor's on his way.
-Shit. -Oh. Great.
Two brand-new IPAs and zero questions about the menu from my brother.
translation.it: Due IPA nuove di zecca e zero domande sul menù da parte di mio fratello.

translation.en: -And let's keep it that way. -[Adam] Hmm.
[takes a deep breath] Okay.
[screams] Goal!
[laughing] Chivas scores!
-Chuy, put it away! -Yup. I have it recorded. It's old.
translation.it: - Chuy, mettilo via. - Sì. È registrato, è vecchio.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] This is really good.
But this beer's fantastic.
I could sell this one. I want ten kegs of this.
translation.it: Potrei venderla. Ne voglio dieci fusti.

translation.en: -This is great. -Ten kegs?
-Yes. -Ten kegs? He wants ten kegs!
-[Wilhelm] We did it! -[Sarah cheers] We did it!
Ah, congratulations, buddy. It's your beer.
That is not my beer.
[shouts] We're still laughing. We're having fun!
I know it wasn't your beer.
translation.it: So che non era la tua!

translation.en: I swapped them out at the last second so that you wouldn't lose your shit -when my beer won. -No, no.
translation.it: Le ho scambiate per non farti dare di matto quando avrei vinto io.

translation.en: -No. -You said you wouldn't do this. You're not letting me celebrate and gloat and have a good time.
translation.it: Avevi promesso di non farlo. Lasciami festeggiare e divertirmi.

translation.en: No, we have bigger problems now. I pissed in your beer.
translation.it: Abbiamo problemi più grossi. Ho pisciato nella birra.

translation.en: -You what? -I pissed in your beer.
translation.it: Tu cosa? Ho pisciato nella tua birra.

translation.en: Guys, I taste a lot of beers.
translation.it: Ho assaggiato un sacco di birra,

translation.en: This is so unique. It's distinctive.
translation.it: ma questa è davvero unica. È particolare.

translation.en: You know what? Let's make it 20 kegs.
I want to put this in every restaurant possible, all right?
translation.it: Voglio piazzarla in tutti i ristoranti.

translation.en: -Yes! -Oh, my God!
-What are we gonna do? -I don't know.
You're an imbecile, and I don't have that much piss.
translation.it: Tu sei scemo e io non piscio così tanto.

translation.en: Mmm! I love it!
